avatar_description: JPG, GIF or PNG up to 5MB.
basic_information_description: Update the basic information for your account.
change_password_description: Update the password used to log in to your account.
delete_account_description: Permanently delete your account and all of its data. This action cannot be undone.
disable_two_factor_warning: Disabling two-factor authentication will weaken your account security.
enable_two_factor_description: Scan the QR code below with your two-factor authentication app then enter the code shown.
preferences_description: Update your account preferences to customise your experience.
recovery_codes_description: These are your recovery codes. You should write them down on a piece of paper and store them in a safe place.
select_your_language: Select the language you would like to use.
two_factor_authentication_description: Add additional security to your account using two-factor authentication.
two_factor_disabled_description: Two-factor authentication has been disabled for your account.
two_factor_enabled_description: Two-factor authentication has been enabled for your account.
use_dark_mode_description: Toggle between light and dark mode.
confirm_your_password_description: This is a secure area of the application. Please confirm your password before continuing.
email_delivered_to: The email was delivered to {{email}}. If you can't find it, check your spam folder.
email_verification_email_sent_descriptio: We've emailed you instructions to verify your email address. You should be receiving it shortly.
failed: These credentials do not match our records.
forgot_your_password_description: Enter your email address below and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
invalid_code: The provided two factor authentication code was invalid.
invalid_recovery_code: The provided two factor recovery code was invalid.
login_to_account_description: Log in using your email address and password.
password_reset_email_sent_description: We've emailed you instructions to reset your password. You should be receiving it shortly.
password_updated_description: Your password has been updated, you can now log in with your new password.
register_new_account_description: Enter your information below to create your account.
reset_your_password_description: Choose a new secure password for your account.
throttle: Too many login attempts. Please try again in {{seconds}} seconds.
two_factor_code_description: Enter the code from your authenticator app to continue.
two_factor_recovery_code_description: Enter one of your recovery codes to continue.
verify_email_description: To complete registration, we need to verify your email address. Please check your email for the verification link.
genericErrorDescription: It looks like something may have gone wrong on our end. Try refreshing the page, or come back later.
